Name: Boom
About the game: Boom is a logic puzzle game with a relaxing atmosphere. Players can place props with different effects to make these props have an effect that detonates a single bomb and then produces a continuous explosion. Use this effect to clear the target in the level and constantly challenge yourself Logical thinking!
